Name: Alice in Wonderland - a jigsaw puzzle tale
About the game: ‚ÄúWhen I used to read fairy tales, I fancied that kind of thing never happened, and now here I am in the middle of one!‚Äù, Alice. Remember 12 great moments from Lewis Carroll‚Äôs classic book. Set up the jigsaw puzzles in a refreshing reinterpretation created in a beautiful style by @Katia.Numakura. Complete the jigsaw puzzle scenes at five different levels of difficulty - from 60 to 735 pieces. Relax with a comforting and exclusive soundtrack . Features include zooming the scene, highlighting border pieces, highlighting pieces from a specific quadrant, shuffling the remaining pieces, previewing the scene, dragging the board. Complete the puzzle in any mode and unlock the image for download. Share it to express your love ‚ù§! Use it as a desktop background to inspire your day üåû! This game is inspired by the book ‚ÄúAlice in Wonderland‚Äù, by Lewis Carroll, a recommended reading for everyone. About his book, the author mentioned: ‚ÄúI'm very much afraid I didn't mean anything but nonsense. Still, you know, words mean more than we mean to express when we use them; so a whole book ought to mean a great deal more than the writer means. So, whatever good meanings are in the book, I'm glad to accept as the meaning of the book.‚Äù What is the meaning of Alice in Wonderland for you? Share your thoughts in our community forum!
